More On The Patent System

13 Mar 2000

James Gleick has written a deep and \nextremely intelligent article on the US \npatent system and how it deals with software \npatents.\n \n

You can read all about it from the New York Times -
\n http://www.nytimes.com/library/magazine/home/20000312mag-patents.html

or with no login required at -
\nhttp://www.around.com/patent.html

- anyone following the Amazon case should have this article as required reading!
